This particular Challenger is especially desirable, as it's one of only 70 50th Anniversary Edition cars built for the 2020 model year – and it's finished in stunning Gold Rush. This Challenger is also unmodified, which is a great benefit, and it features some excellent equipment like 20-inch wheels, an active exhaust system, a high-performance suspension system, and Brembo brakes.
